utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you realize this is probably the last time we’ll all be here in the coffee house as six single people?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why?! What’s happening to the coffee house?! Oh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yep! From now on its gonna be the four of you guys and me and the misses. The little woman. The wife. The old ball and chain.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Old?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The young hot ball and chain.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s much better.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Op! We gotta go!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, where are you guys going?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We’re gonna pick up the wedding dress then we’re gonna have lunch with mom.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ah. Joey you’re-you’re having lunch with my mom?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, I-I just heard lunch. But yeah, I can go. Sure!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know what? Actually I’m kinda glad they’re leaving ‘cause uh, I need to talk to you about something.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What’s up?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well this uh, this may be a little awkward.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Listen, if you want to borrow money, its kind of a bad time. I’m buying dinner for 128 people tomorrow night.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, its…Its not that. Umm, now what I’m going to say to you, I’m not saying as your friend. Okay? I’m-I’m saying as it as Monica’s older brother.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But you’re still my friend?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Not for the next few minutes.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: During this time…are you, are you still my best man?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nope.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Do I still call you Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay! You guys are getting married tomorrow and-and I couldn’t be more thrilled for both of you, but as Monica’s older brother I-I have to tell you this. If you ever hurt my little sister, if you ever cause her any unhappiness of any kind, I will hunt you down, and kick your ass! What? I’m-I’m-I’m serious! Come—Hey! Dude! Stop it! Okay? I’m-I’m not kidding here!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, I hear what your saying, okay? And, thanks for the warning.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No problem.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So are we…friends again?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. You won’t believe what Monica’s older brother just said to me!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What ‘cha doing Mon?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m making a list of all the things that are most likely to go wrong at the wedding. Now, that way I can be prepared.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What are they?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, so far I have uh, my bride’s maids dresses won’t get picked up, my veil gets lost, or I don’t have my something blue.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Those are all the things I’m responsible for!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I had to go with the odds Rach.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! You guys! Remember that audition I had a while ago and didn’t get the part?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: The commercial?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That play?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That other play?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nooo!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: The movie?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes that’s the one about the soldiers who fight in World War I!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, yeah! Back then y’know, we called the Great War. It really was!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well anyway, the guy they wanted backed out and now they want me! I start shooting today!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Congratulations!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh that’s great!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait! Wait! Wait! You can’t start today! Today’s the rehearsal dinner!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh no, I’ll be done by then.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh. Well then way to go you big movie star!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know! All right, I’ll see you guys over there! I’m off to fight the Nazis.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, wait Joey! We fought the Nazis in World War II, not World War I.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa! Okay. Yeah well, who-who was in World War I?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Go ahead.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You’re gonna be late! Go! Go!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who did we fight in World War I?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Mexico?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes! Very good.

utterance.speaker: The Assistant Director
utterance.content: Hey Joey! We’re ready.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! Me too.

utterance.speaker: The Assistant Director
utterance.content: Richard? We’re ready for you. Joey Tribbiani? This is Richard Crosby he’s playing Vincent.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m doing my scenes with you?

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Nice to meet you Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow! I can’t believe this! This is incredible. I mean you just won an Oscar!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: No I didn’t.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I think you did.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: I think I lost. Three times.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh…Cookie?

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: Okay! We’re about an hour away from getting the scene lit. So uh, if you guys don’t mind, can we run it a couple of times?

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Yeah, sure.

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: Okay, all right. Let’s do it. And…Action!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We have to find the rest of the platoon!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Forget the platoon! The platoon is gone!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: The platoon is dead! Face facts Tony!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So what are we gonna do?! We have no reinforcements! No-no food!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: No, we still have food in the basement! I saw potatoes and some dry pasta!

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: Hang on a minute! Joey, you keep touching your face. Is something wrong?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No. Nope, I uh…I th—I thought it might be kind of a cool character thing. Y’know? He’s uh, he’s a face toucher.

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: I don’t think so. Let’s take it back to Richard’s last line. Action!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: We may not have any weapons, but we still have food. In the basement I saw potatoes and some dry pasta, and a few tins of tuna!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey, we gotta go!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. Here’s a question you never have to ask. My dad just called and wanted to know if he could borrow one of your pearl necklaces.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don’t have anything like that, but let me go see if Rachel does.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, include more people in this.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, do you realize that at this time tomorrow we’ll be getting married?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wait a minute! I have a date tomorrow night.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I just, I can’t believe that we made it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well you don’t have to sound so surprised.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m sorry but…nothing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well…honestly ever since we got engaged I have been waiting for something to, to flip you out.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Honestly? Me too.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah. Y’know I keep thinking that something stupid is gonna come up and I’ll go all…Chandler. But nothing has.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh, I’m so glad. Thank you so much for staying so calm during this. I mean it’s really, it’s made me stay calm. I coulda been worse!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. I’ll be right there.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi! If you’re calling before Saturday, you’ve reached Monica and Chandler. But if you’re calling after Saturday, you’ve reached Mr. and Mrs. Bing! Please leave a message for the Bings!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Maureen! Gosh! Hey uh, Chandler? This is my cousin Maureen.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We’re the Bings.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Oh you guys look so beautiful!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Mr. and Mrs. Bing!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow Monica! Hey, just so you know I had my uh, older brother chat with Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What is that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well I…I told him that if he ever hurt you I would hunt him down and kick his ass! What?! What?! What is the matter with everybody?! I am serious! I would kick his ass!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ross, please! My make-up!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Mom. Thanks for wearing something.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Oh honey! This is so exciting! I thought we screwed you up so bad this day would never come. Oh and just think. Soon there’ll be lots of little Bings.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Mrs. Bing? Here, these are my parents umm, Judy and Jack Geller.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Geller
utterance.content: It’s lovely to meet you.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: So are you his mother or his father?

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Geller
utterance.content: Jack!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: What?! I’ve never seen one before!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Dad! There’s Ross , why don’t you go talk to him?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: I didn’t even have a chance to act as though I’m okay with it!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Bing
utterance.content: Hello all!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi…dad.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi Mr.…Bing.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Bing
utterance.content: Nora!

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Charles.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It-it’s so great to see you both here.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Bing
utterance.content: Yes! Although, I think we may be seeing a little too much of some people. Aren’t you a little old to be wearing a dress like that?

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Don’t you have a little too much penis to be wearing a dress like that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: …of course you can kick his ass son.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Geller
utterance.content: You could kick anyone’s ass you want too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks you guys.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, Rach! Rach! Umm hey, could you do me a favor and would talk to Chandler’s dad and try to keep him away from Chandler’s mom?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! But I don’t know what he looks like!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He is the man in the black dress.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Man in the black dress… Hi! I’m Rachel! I’m a friend of Monica and Chandler’s!

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: I’m Amanda.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh I get it! A…man…duh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Can I have everyone’s attention please? I’m uh; I’m Ross Geller.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Doctor Ross Geller.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dad…dad, please! As I was saying umm, I’m Dr. Ross Geller. Uhh, and I’m the best man. And uh, this marriage is doubly special for me umm, because not only is the groom my best friend but uh, the bride is my little sister. And, she’s the greatest sister a guy could ask for. So if you’d all please join me in raising a glass to the, the couple we’re here to celebrate. To the Bings.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: To the Bings!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, I’m gonna go steam my wedding dress okay? Who wants the responsibility of making sure nothing happens to it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’ll do it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who wants it? Anybody?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I said I’ll do it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Nobody wants to do it? All right, I’ll do it myself.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica! I’m not gonna screw it up!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know what? You’re right, I’m sorry. Actually you were a big help tonight. Yeah, and thanks for putting my grandmother in the cab and making sure she got to the hotel safely.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well of course that is what I’m here for!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. Sorry.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh! What grandmother?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Where have you been?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, taking my parents back to the hotel.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? Are you going back to work?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nice shades.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thanks. Yeah, I figure if I wear these in my scenes at least I won’t get spit in the eyes, y’know?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And if I remember correctly, Ray Ban was the official sponsor of World War I!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Great! All right. I’ll see you later.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, where’s Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, I think he’s in Rachel’s room. See ya.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chandler? Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is uh, is Monica here?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She’s steaming her dress, why? What’s up?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I think Chandler’s gone.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: He left that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Tell Monica I’m sorry.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What’s up? Tell Monica I’m sorry. Tell her yourself!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! Chandler just left though!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah but, maybe it’s not what we think. Maybe it’s tell Monica I’m sorry I…drank the last of the milk.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Or maybe he-he was writing to tell her that-that he’s changed his name, y’know? Tell Monica I’m sorry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I think it means he freaked out and left!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Don’t be so negative! Good God! Isn’t it possible that Sorry is sitting in there right now?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Phoebe, I-I think Ross is right. What are we gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look—Okay, I’m just gonna—I’m gonna have to go find him and bring him back! Okay? You-you make sure Monica does not find out, okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay but if you don’t find him and bring him back, I am gonna hunt you down and kick your ass!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I will, I will find him.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Hey Joey, could you uh, go through these lines with me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh man! They-they just redid my make-up!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Just the last two pages.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: I found the picture!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Picture? What picture?

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Could you uh, could you lower your script? I need to see your face so I can uh, play off your reaction.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay uh, look I know you’re a great actor, okay? And you play all those Shakespeare guys and stuff…

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Oh, thanks.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But you’re spittin’ all over me man!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Well of course I am!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You know you’ve been spitting on me?!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: That’s what real actors do! Annunciation is the mark of a good actor! And when you enunciate, you spit!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow! Didn’t know that.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Great!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thanks! Okay-okay check it out! Picture? What picture? Eh?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Gunther have you uh, have you seen Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: No. No, I haven’t seen him.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh damn!

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: He’s getting married tomorrow right?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes. Yes. Don’t worry. Everything’s fine. We’ll uh, we’ll see you tomorrow at the wedding.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: I wasn’t invited.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well then we’ll-we’ll see you the day after tomorrow. Mom?! Dad?! What-what…what you guys doing here?!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Well you kids talk about this place so much, we thought we’d see what all the fuss is about.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Geller
utterance.content: I certainly see what the girls like coming here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why?!

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Geller
utterance.content: The sexy blonde behind the counter.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Gunther?!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Your mother just added him to her list.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? Your-your list?

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Geller
utterance.content: Yeah, the list that—of people we’re allowed to sleep…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes! No-no! I know, I know what the list is! Mom! Look if you see Chandler, could you just let him know I’m looking for him?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: And if you see Rita Moreno, let her know I’m looking for her.

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: Action!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: I found the picture!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What picture?!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: The picture of my wife! In your pack!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You went through my personal property?

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Why do have a picture of Paulette in your pack?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Because Vincent, we were lovers. For two years!

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: Cut! Wonderful!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Great scene yeah?

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Oh you’re awesome! And, in that last speech? You soaked me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thanks a lot.

utterance.speaker: The Assistant Director
utterance.content: Here’s your call sheet for tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I’m-I’m not working tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: The Assistant Director
utterance.content: You are now.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! No! I can’t! You gotta get me out of it! I’ve got plans! Important plans!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross said there’s still no word from Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh man.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh but he did say that they found the grandmother wandering down fifth avenue.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Well there’s one down.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m getting married today!!! I think I just cracked a rib. But I don’t care because today’s my wedding day! My day is finally here!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y’know she might not even notice he’s gone.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m gonna start getting ready!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: God! Don’t—We can’t let her start getting ready! This is too awful! Oh God, but wait she’ll be in the gown and then he won’t show up and then she’s gonna have to take off the gown…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Shhh! Stop it! Stop it Rachel! You can’t do this here!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m sorry. I’m sorry. It’s just…It’s just so sad!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, but you’ve got to pull yourself together! Monica can’t see you like this! Then she’ll know something’s wrong!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know. I know. Oh God. There’s no tissue! Can you grab me some toilet paper?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. Oh, that’s gone too. This is Monica’s bathroom right?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No-no! I-I…I found one.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh thank you! Oh God! Can I have another one?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sure. Do you need some floss?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God I just can not imagine what is gonna happen if Chandler doesn’t show up!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh here’s a whole bunch.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I mean she’s gonna be at the wedding waiting for him and people will be whispering, "Oh that poor girl." Y’know? Then she’ll have to come back here and live all alone.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: There was a pregnancy test in the garbage, and it’s positive. Monica’s pregnant. So I guess she won’t be totally alone.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know! Monica’s gonna have a baby! Hey, can this count as her something new?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, do you think this is why Chandler took off?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, she had to have just taken that test because I took out the trash last night.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh God, this is turning into the worst wedding day ever! The bride is pregnant. The groom is missing. And I’m still holding this.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay Phoebe, we can not tell anyone about this.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Right.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, okay. Hey, wait. Do you know what kind of birth control she was using?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. Why?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Just for the future, this is hardly a commercial for it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Anything?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! I talked to Joey on the set, he hasn’t heard from him. I-I-I talked to Chandler’s parents again!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You told them he was missing?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! I made it seem like I was just calling to chat. Pretty sure, they both think I’m interested in them.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, we’ve got to tell her he’s gone.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! Hey! Hey! We can’t!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, she’s gonna start getting ready soon!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, can’t you at least stall her a little? I’ll-I’ll go back to some of the places I went last night.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, well how much time do you need?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well how much time before she absolutely has to start getting ready?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: One hour.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Give me two.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Then why do you ask?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, wish me luck.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. I’m going with you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ross, you’re tired. You’ve been looking all night. And clearly you suck at this.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, I’ll see you guys later.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Wait, do you know how you’re going to stall her?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’ll figure something out.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right. Good luck.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! Okay, so I thought we’d start with my make up and then do my hair.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay uh, but before you do that. I-I, I need you to talk to me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: About what?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Umm… I’m never gonna getting married!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah you will! The right guy is just around the corner! Okay, are we done with that?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No Monica! I’m serious! Oh, maybe I should just forget about it. Become a lesbian or something.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Any woman would be lucky to have ya.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well maybe it would make me feel better if I slept with Joey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel! You okay?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Excuse me, Aaron? Hi! Umm, I have a little problem with the schedules. Originally, I wasn’t supposed to work today, and I have this wedding that I really have to be at. It’s my best friend’s, and I’m officiating so I really can’t work past four.

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: Joey, you gotta stay until the end. We can’t stop filming just for you. It’s not like it’s your wedding.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m having surgery!

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I-I just made up the stuff about the wedding because I didn’t want you to worry about me. But, I’m having surgery today.

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: What kind of surgery?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Transplant.

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: But you’re supposed to work on Monday.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hair transplant.

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: But you’re not bald.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It’s not on my head.

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: Look Joey, there’s nothing I can do. Besides, you’re probably gonna be out by four anyway. We’ve just got one short scene. It’s just you and Richard, and God knows he’s a pro. You’ll be fine. Morning Richard.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! You’re here! Great! Great! Great! Let’s get going buddy, we’ve got a scene to shoot!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: I’m wearing two belts.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are you drunk?

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes you are!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We are never gonna find him! He’s one guy in a huge city!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! Is that him?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That is an old, Chinese woman!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: He could be in disguise, y’know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Aw, y’know…Y’know, maybe we’re-we’re just approaching this all wrong. If you’re Chandler and-and you wanna hide, where is the last place on Earth people would think you’d go?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So this is your office?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How did you guys find me? I knew I should’ve hid at the gym!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What the hell are you doing?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Panicking! And using the Internet to try to prove that I’m related to Monica. How is she?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She’s fine. She doesn’t know you’re gone. And she doesn’t have to know, okay? Now come on, we’re going home.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No! No! No! I can’t do that!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why not?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Because if I go home, we’re gonna become the Bings! I can’t be the Bings!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What’s wrong with being the Bings?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The Bings have horrible marriages! They yell. They fight. And they use the pool boy as a pawn in their sexual games!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chandler, have you ever put on a black cocktail dress and asked me up to your hotel room?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Then you are neither of your parents!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It’s not just their marriage! I mean, look at yours. Look at everybody’s! The only person that can make marriage work is Paul Newman! And I’ve met me; I am not Paul Newman. I don’t race cars! I don’t make popcorn! None of my proceeds go to charity.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But look Chandler, right now, no one has a lower opinion of you than I do. But I totally believe you can do this.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I want to. I love her so much, but I’m afr…It’s too huge.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know, okay. You’re right. It is huge. So why don’t we take it just a little bit at a time? Okay? Umm, forget getting married for a sec; just forget about it. Can you just come home and take a shower?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well yeah, but then…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah—No-but-but-but-but! We’re just gonna go home and take a shower. Now, that’s not scary right?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Depends on what you mean by we.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: The nights are the hardest. But then the day comes! And that’s every bit as hard as the night. And then the night comes again…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The days and nights are hard! I get it! Okay? Look umm, Rachel I’m sorry! I have to start getting ready! I’m getting married today!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know. At dusk. That’s such a hard time for me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m gonna go put my make up on, we have to be at the hotel in an hour!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. But wait!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Let’s go to lunch.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can’t go to lunch!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Right.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh good God! I’ve fallen down!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. All right. Honey listen. When I tell you what I’m about to tell you, I need you to remember that we are all here for you and that we love you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, you’re-you’re really freaking me out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We can’t find Chandler…—‘s vest. We can’t find Chandler’s vest.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How can that be?! Oh wait! Wait! Are you, are you serious?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Found the vest! I mean we’re gonna have to keep an eye on it, y’know make sure we don’t lose it again…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh wow! Okay. Don’t scare me like that okay? I mean for a minute there I was like, "Oh my God! The worst has happened!"

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I would sooner die in this hellhole then see her back with you!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: That can be arranged.

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: Let’s reset.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?! He got me! Owwwwww!!!

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: Let’s take it from there.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Are you a little off today? It’s going terribly slowly.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, my best friends are getting married in like an hour. Okay? And I’m the minister. Please! Please! Can you pull it together?

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Of course! I’m-I’m sorry. I-I’d hate you to miss anything like that on account of me. I can do this!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thank you. Thank you.

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: Still rolling, annnnd action!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I would sooner die in this hellhole then see her back with you!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Now, that can be arranged! Slippery little bugger!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So-so you two were married huh? What happened? You just drift apart?

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Geller
utterance.content: Here comes the bride.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God Monica!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I wanna wear this everyday.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You look so beautiful.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m so happy for me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hello?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Did Chandler show up yet?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, we got him back. Everything’s fine.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Damnit!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? Why? Where are you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m still on the set!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey! The wedding is in less than an hour!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know! I’m sorry! The guy’s drunk, they won’t let me go until we get this.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! I’m gonna have to find another minister.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! No, I’m the minister! All right, look-look, put ‘em both on the phone, I’ll marry them right now.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh! Joey, I have to go.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Don’t you hang up on me! I’ll marry you and me right now! I have the power!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There you go. You put on a tuxedo! Now that wasn’t so scary, was it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m telling you, just a little bit at a time.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah okay. Well, what’s the next little bit?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Getting married. Okay. Okay. You can, you can do that too! Just like you’ve done everything else!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah. You’re right. Hey I-I can do that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, excuse me for a minute.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wh—Hey—Whoa-whoa, where, where you going?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ross, I am not gonna run away again! I just want to get a little fresh air.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh fresh air!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wait! Maybe, maybe you’re overreacting! You do that y’know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well Phoebe, we gotta do something! Well, y’know. I mean there’s no way Joey’s gonna make it in time. So I’m gonna through the hotel and see if there’s any other weddings going on.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Oh but don’t tell them Monica’s pregnant because, they frown on that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Anastassakis/Papasifakis wedding, excellent! {It’s a good thing Jennifer Aniston is Greek, because she had to pronounce those names. Luckily for me, they were written on a sign.} Congratulations. Mazel Tov! Hi! Oh, great hat. Listen umm, I need you to perform another wedding. Can you do that?

utterance.speaker: The Rabbi
utterance.content: I don’t know. Are they Greek Orthodox?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! Yeah. They’re…they’re-they’re my friends, uh, Monica Stephanopolus and uh, and Chandler Acidofolus.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi! Hi! Hi. Has umm, anyone seen Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: I thought he was with you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: He-he was with me umm, we’re playing a little game, y’know? Hide and seek.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: You can’t ask us son, that’s cheating.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You’re right, thanks for keeping me honest dad.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Geller
utterance.content: Well, he better not come by here. He can’t see the bride in the wedding dress.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: As I recall when we got married, I saw the groom in the wedding dress.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Bing
utterance.content: But that was after the wedding, it’s not bad luck then.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Honey, it isn’t good luck.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God! Monica!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know! Hey, how’s Chandler doin’?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Great. He’s doing great. Don’t you worry about Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, you’re-you’re sweating.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: These-these are beads of joy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh that’s sweet. Don’t touch me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh Phoebe, can I see you for a second?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chandler’s gone again!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! Why would you play hide and seek with someone you know is a flight risk?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Aaron! You gotta let me go. The guy’s hammered!

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: I’m sorry Joey, as long as he’s here and he’s conscious we’re still shooting.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: You wouldn’t happen to have a very big fork?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So I uh, I just talked to the director. That’s it, we’re done for the day.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Well have we finished the scene?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! You…you were wonderful.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: As were you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So I got your car, it’s right outside.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Why? Are we done for the day?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s what you told me.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Oh, thank you. You’re welcome.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no-no! We gotta go! Come on! Here we go.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Is that my ass?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There he is!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! Oh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You’re not getting away this time mister! Unless you want that ass kicking we talked about!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hiiii-Ya!! I’m serious! You’re not walking out on my sister!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s right! I’m not!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Then where the hell have you been?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know about Monica.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You know?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I heard you and Rachel talking.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?! What?! Talking about what?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You don’t know?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Know what—If somebody doesn’t tell me what’s going on right now…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What? You’ll hi-ya?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica’s pregnant.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God. Oh my God! And you’re-you’re…you’re not freaking out?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well I was! Then I went down to the gift shop because I was out of cigarettes…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Ross
utterance.content: Cigarettes?!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Big picture please! So I was in the gift shop, and that’s when I uh, saw this. New York.) Yeah, y’know what? I thought anything that can fit into this, can’t be scary.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well you obviously didn’t see Chucky 3.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But come on, look at how cute and small this is! So I got it to give Monica so she’d know I was okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dude.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Way to go son! I knew you’d find him!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Bing
utterance.content: Our little boy is getting married.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Oh look at you! So handsome!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You look beautiful mom. You look beautiful too dad. I love you both. I’m so glad you here.

utterance.speaker: The Rabbi
utterance.content: Are you Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you Joey?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Huh. This is nice.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’ve never walked down the aisle knowing it can’t end in divorce.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Geller
utterance.content: Oh I wish you’re grandmother had lived to see this.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She’s right there.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Geller
utterance.content: Not that old crow, my mother. Congratulations darling.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: I love you sweetheart.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You look beautiful. Is this new?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Not now.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who is this?

utterance.speaker: The Rabbi
utterance.content: I am Father Kalebasous.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He’s Greek Orthodox.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: As are you…

utterance.speaker: The Rabbi
utterance.content: Let us begin. Dearly beloved…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s my line! I can take it from here, thanks. Dearly beloved, I’m sorry I’m a little late. You may be confused by this now, but you won’t be Memorial Day weekend 2002. Well, let’s get started before the groom takes off again. Huh? We are gathered here today, to join this man and this woman in the bonds of holy matrimony. I’ve known Monica and Chandler for a long time, and I can not imagine two people more perfect for each other. And now, as I’ve left my notes in my dressing room. We shall proceed to the vows. Monica?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He took off?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Go on! Go on.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, for so long I…I wondered if I would ever find my prince, my soul mate. Then three years ago, at another wedding I turned to a friend for comfort. And in stead, I found everything that I’d ever been looking for my whole life. And now…here we are…with our future before us…and I only want to spend it with you, my prince, my soul mate, my friend. Unless you don’t want to. You go!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, that’s okay. Monica I thought this was going to be the most difficult thing I ever gonna had to do. But when I saw you walking down that aisle I realized how simple it was. I love you. Any surprises that come our way it’s okay, because I will always love you. You are the person I was meant to spend the rest of my life with. You wanna know if I’m sure?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You may not kiss the bride. So, I guess by the powers vested in my by the state of New York and the Internet guys, I now pronounce you husband and wife. Oh wait! Do you take each other?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I do.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I do.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah you do!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rings?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Aw crap! Okay—uh…uh let’s-let’s do the rings.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We good? Yeah? Good? Once again, I pronounce you husband and wife. Now kiss her again.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I love you. And I know about the baby.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What baby?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Our baby.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We have a baby?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Phoebe found your pregnancy test in the trash.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I didn’t take a pregnancy test.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Then…who did?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh and they’re gonna have a baby.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-huh.
